I appreciate aesthetics in code, but somehow package dependencies have neve=
r triggered my OCD. In any case, JUnit 5 is an API release. Repackaging sho=
uld be decoupled into either 4.12 or 5.1.

Kent

On Mar 6, 2013, at 8:11 AM=
, Paul Holser wrote:

> http://edmundkirwan.com/general/junit.html
> 
> An =
enlightening post about how JUnit's package structure has evolved over time=
. I wonder if a JUnit 5 might endeavor to reduce package tangle?
> 
> Perso=
nally, I'd like to see more functionality extracted from the core and moved=
 into dependent modules -- specific runners, rules, etc.
> 
> Cheers,
> p
>=
